mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_no, q.member_no, m.member_name, q.qna_category, q.qna_title, q.qna_content, q.qna_secret, q.create_date, q.update_date, c.admin_no, a.admin_name, c.qna_comment_content, c.comment_date FROM qna q LEFT JOIN qna_comment c ON q.qna_no = c.qna_no LEFT JOIN member m ON q.member_no = m.member_no LEFT JOIN admin a ON c.admin_no = a.admin_no WHERE q.qna_no = #{qnaNo}

SELECT re.reserve_no, m.member_name, ac.accom_name, r.room_name, p.payment_method, p.payment_price, re.reserve_use, re.reserve_info, re.reserve_date, re.reserve_cancel_date, re.reserve_check_in, re.reserve_check_out FROM reserve re JOIN payment p ON p.reserve_no = re.reserve_no JOIN member m ON re.member_no = m.member_no JOIN room r ON r.room_no = re.room_no JOIN accom ac ON r.accom_no = ac.accom_no WHERE re.reserve_no = #{reserveNo};

SELECT c.complain_no, p.payment_no, c.complain_category, c.complain_title, c.complain_content, c.create_date, c.update_date, m.member_name, h.host_name, a.accom_name, ro.room_name, cc.complain_comment_content, cc.comment_date FROM complain c LEFT JOIN payment p ON c.payment_no = p.payment_no LEFT JOIN reserve r ON p.reserve_no = r.reserve_no LEFT JOIN room ro ON ro.room_no = r.room_no LEFT JOIN accom a ON a.accom_no = ro.accom_no LEFT JOIN member m ON r.member_no = m.member_no LEFT JOIN host h ON a.host_no = h.host_no LEFT JOIN complain_comment cc ON cc.complain_no = c.complain_no WHERE c.complain_no = #{complainNo}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(p.update_date) =1 THEN p.payment_price END),0) january, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(p.update_date) =2 THEN p.payment_price END),0) february, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(p.update_date) =3 THEN p.payment_price END),0) march, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(p.update_date) =4 THEN p.payment_price END),0) april, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(p.update_date) =5 THEN p.payment_price END),0) may, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(p.update_date) =6 THEN p.payment_price END),0) june, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(p.update_date) =7 THEN p.payment_price END),0) july, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(p.update_date) =8 THEN p.payment_price END),0) august, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(p.update_date) =9 THEN p.payment_price END),0) september, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(p.update_date) =10 THEN p.payment_price END),0) october, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(p.update_date) =11 THEN p.payment_price END),0) november, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(p.update_date) =12 THEN p.payment_price END),0) december FROM reserve re JOIN payment p ON p.reserve_no = re.reserve_no JOIN member m ON re.member_no = m.member_no JOIN room r ON r.room_no = re.room_no JOIN accom ac ON r.accom_no = ac.accom_no WHERE YEAR(p.update_date) = #{year} AND re.member_no = #{memberNo}

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN MONTH(reserve_date) =1 THEN member_no END) AS january, COUNT(CASE WHEN MONTH(reserve_date) =2 THEN member_no END) AS february, COUNT(CASE WHEN MONTH(reserve_date) =3 THEN member_no END) AS march, COUNT(CASE WHEN MONTH(reserve_date) =4 THEN member_no END) AS april, COUNT(CASE WHEN MONTH(reserve_date) =5 THEN member_no END) AS may, COUNT(CASE WHEN MONTH(reserve_date) =6 THEN member_no END) AS june, COUNT(CASE WHEN MONTH(reserve_date) =7 THEN member_no END) AS july, COUNT(CASE WHEN MONTH(reserve_date) =8 THEN member_no END) AS august, COUNT(CASE WHEN MONTH(reserve_date) =9 THEN member_no END) AS september, COUNT(CASE WHEN MONTH(reserve_date) =10 THEN member_no END) AS october, COUNT(CASE WHEN MONTH(reserve_date) =11 THEN member_no END) AS november, COUNT(CASE WHEN MONTH(reserve_date) =12 THEN member_no END) AS december FROM reserve WHERE YEAR(reserve_date) = #{year} AND member_no = #{memberNo}

SELECT IFNULL(count(CASE WHEN MONTH(re.reserve_date) =1 THEN addr.sido END),0) january, IFNULL(count(CASE WHEN MONTH(re.reserve_date) =2 THEN addr.sido END),0) february, IFNULL(count(CASE WHEN MONTH(re.reserve_date) =3 THEN addr.sido END),0) march, IFNULL(count(CASE WHEN MONTH(re.reserve_date) =4 THEN addr.sido END),0) april, IFNULL(count(CASE WHEN MONTH(re.reserve_date) =5 THEN addr.sido END),0) may, IFNULL(count(CASE WHEN MONTH(re.reserve_date) =6 THEN addr.sido END),0) june, IFNULL(count(CASE WHEN MONTH(re.reserve_date) =7 THEN addr.sido END),0) july, IFNULL(count(CASE WHEN MONTH(re.reserve_date) =8 THEN addr.sido END),0) august, IFNULL(count(CASE WHEN MONTH(re.reserve_date) =9 THEN addr.sido END),0) september, IFNULL(count(CASE WHEN MONTH(re.reserve_date) =10 THEN addr.sido END),0) october, IFNULL(count(CASE WHEN MONTH(re.reserve_date) =11 THEN addr.sido END),0) november, IFNULL(count(CASE WHEN MONTH(re.reserve_date) =12 THEN addr.sido END),0) december FROM payment pa LEFT JOIN reserve re ON pa.reserve_no = re.reserve_no LEFT JOIN room ro ON re.room_no = ro.room_no LEFT JOIN accom ac ON ro.accom_no = ac.accom_no LEFT JOIN accom_address acd ON ac.accom_no = acd.accom_no LEFT JOIN address addr ON acd.address_no = addr.address_no WHERE re.member_no = #{memberNo} AND YEAR(pa.update_date) = #{year} AND re.reserve_use = '이용 완료' AND addr.sido = #{sido}

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='강원') THEN addr.sido END),0) 강원, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='경기') THEN addr.sido END),0) 경기, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='경남') THEN addr.sido END),0) 경남, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='경북') THEN addr.sido END),0) 경북, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='광주') THEN addr.sido END),0) 광주, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='대구') THEN addr.sido END),0) 대구, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='대전') THEN addr.sido END),0) 대전, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='부산') THEN addr.sido END),0) 부산, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='서울') THEN addr.sido END),0) 서울, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='세종특별자치시') THEN addr.sido END),0) 세종특별자치시, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='울산') THEN addr.sido END),0) 울산, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='인천') THEN addr.sido END),0) 인천, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='전남') THEN addr.sido END),0) 전남, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='전북') THEN addr.sido END),0) 전북, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='제주특별자치도') THEN addr.sido END),0) 제주특별자치도, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='충남') THEN addr.sido END),0) 충남, IFNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN (addr.sido ='충북') THEN addr.sido END),0) 충북 FROM payment pa LEFT JOIN reserve re ON pa.reserve_no = re.reserve_no LEFT JOIN room ro ON re.room_no = ro.room_no LEFT JOIN accom ac ON ro.accom_no = ac.accom_no LEFT JOIN accom_address acd ON ac.accom_no = acd.accom_no LEFT JOIN address addr ON acd.address_no = addr.address_no WHERE re.member_no = #{memberNo} AND YEAR(pa.update_date) = #{year} AND re.reserve_use = '이용 완료'
